comment:
"They pay flat $40 for any story, no matter the length or type. If dispatched for a meeting, payment is based on stories generated, not for attendance. Photographs are a flat $20, no matter how many photographs are generated or picked for publication. 

The low rate ensures, unfortunately, that freelancers cannot report deeply and at length for any issue. "
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "Paid in a timely fashion, professional polite editors."
